attributes.action: Change the amount of Sparx Reader Points required to complete homework to 200.
attributes.additional_details: Because many people spend hours a day trying to complete this assignment and most pupils want to lower the required amount to atleast 200 SRP.
attributes.background: Lower the amount of Sparx Reader points you need to complete the assignment on Sparx Reader.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Sparx, not the UK Government or Parliament.
